title: Total sales of Olive Garden in the U.S. 2016 to 2019
summary: In general Sales in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Sales in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2019.
Maximum Sales in billion U.S. dollars, about 4.29 was reported at Year 2019
The lowest Sales in billion U.S. dollars, of value 3.94 was reported at Year 2017
